ЁЯСС
Founder of the Kadamba Dynasty

Founded the first indigenous dynasty of Karnataka, the 'Kadamba'. Made 'Banavasi' his capital.

тЪФя╕П
From Brahmin to Warrior

According to the Talagunda inscription, he was a Vedic Brahmin who went to Kanchi (Pallava capital) for studies. After being insulted by the Pallava horsemen there, he took up arms and established his kingdom by defeating the Pallavas.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Title: Later adopted 'Varma' (a Kshatriya surname) and came to be known as Mayuravarma.
  • Yajnas: Credited with performing 18 Ashwamedha Yajnas.
  • Culture: First ruler to promote Kannada language as the state language.
